text: Cheburashka () is a 1971 Soviet animated movie directed by Roman Kachanov.Чебурашка раздора: золотую коллекцию "Союзмультфильма" японцы просто так не вернутЧебурашка (1972) ==Actors== *Klara Rumyanova as Cheburashka *Vasily Livanov as Gena the Crocodile *Vladimir Ferapontov as Gena (singing voice) *Tamara Dmitrieva as Pioneers == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1971 movies Category:1970s animated movies Category:Soviet animated movies Category:Movies directed by Roman Kachanov
title: Cheburashka (1971 movie)
